alert.note: Alert for Lee; Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 3:46PM CST until January 03 at 4:15PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN LEE AND NORTHWESTERN RUSSELL COUNTIES... At 346 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Griffen Mill, or 9 miles southwest of Smiths, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Smiths, Smiths Station, Bleecker, Griffen Mill, Ladonia and Monterey Heights. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for southeastern and east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
